name: Astrobees Lunar Simulator
description:
This is a Lunar Spacewalk Simulator. 

The surface you will walk on is derived from NASA data of the actual lunar surface! The UB Astrobees will be using this online simulation to remotely test out our UI Menu Designs for the NASA SUITS AR Challenge. 

The simulation is a Work In Progress. There are many components of this game that are still in  development (i.e. The Fun Mechanics)!  Your constructive feedback would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you for playing!

Credit: 

  • Music by artdsigns from Pixabay
  • Moon Textures and Data from NASA
  • 3D Space Exploration Vehicle Model from https://nasa3d.arc.nasa.gov/detail/nmss-sev
  • 3D Habitat Demonstration Hud Model from https://nasa3d.arc.nasa.gov/detail/nmss-hdu

..........................................................

DICLAIMERS:

(i.e Glitches We Will Be Fixing By February) 

  • Camera Issues:
    • Player looking function is inverted, moving around may take some getting used to.
  • For MAC users:
    • The UI interface is very tiny and may be very hard to read.
    • Browser play is not fully compatible with MAC. The game is only functional in the downloadable file (named: MAC.zip) at the very bottom.
  • How to QUIT a Downloaded Program File:
    • MAC0S: PRESS [COMMAND + Q]
    • WINDOWS: PRESS [CTRL + SHIFT + ESC]
